General.Name: Enma Al Rawabi Co
General.Description: Enma Al Rawabi Investment & Real Estate Development Company engages in the investment and real estate development activities in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It manages and leases owned or leased residential and commercial properties. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: 4631 Prince Fahd Bin Salman Bin Abdulazi, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 7864
